forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High near 65F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
